DOC.brief_summary: The aim study investigate whether continuous interdisciplinary intervention improve medication adherence lead reduction hospitalization mortality elderly patient chronic heart failure . The intervention , consist regular contact local pharmacy weekly dosing aid , aim improve medication adherence management .
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacy-based Interdisciplinary Program Patients With Chronic Heart Failure
DOC.criteria: Age : 60 year old Chronic heart failure ( CHF ) Stable CHF medication include diuretic Hospitalization decompensated heart failure within past 12 month OR value ≥ 350 pg/mL BNP ≥ 1,400 pg/mL NTproBNP Written inform consent Use weekly dose aid Unwillingness inability visit participate pharmacy week Planned cardiac surgery Lifeexpectancy < 6 month Unwillingness inability comply study protocol ( include drug abuse alcohol dependency ) Participation study ( currently last 3 month )
